trans-unit.source: Displays the values of a data source by using user-defined templates.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用用户定义的模板来显示数据源的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control enables users to select, sort, delete, edit, and insert records.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控件使用户能够选择、排序、删除、编辑和插入记录。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: [Introduction](#introduction)
trans-unit.target: [介绍](#introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Templates](#templates)
trans-unit.target: [模板](#templates)

trans-unit.source: [Binding to a Data Source](#binding_to_a_data_source)
trans-unit.target: [绑定到数据源](#binding_to_a_data_source)

trans-unit.source: [Data Operations](#data_operations)
trans-unit.target: [数据操作](#data_operations)

trans-unit.source: [Events](#Events)
trans-unit.target: [事件](#Events)

trans-unit.source: [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax)
trans-unit.target: [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is used to display the values from a data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件用于显示数据源中的值。

trans-unit.source: It resembles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, except that it displays data by using user-defined templates instead of row fields.
trans-unit.target: 它类似于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件，区别在于它会显示数据，而不是行字段中使用用户定义的模板。

trans-unit.source: Creating your own templates gives you more flexibility in controlling how the data is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 创建你自己的模板为你提供更灵活地控制如何显示数据。

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=199759).
trans-unit.target: 具有源代码的 Visual Studio 项目是用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=199759)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control supports the following features:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件支持以下功能：

trans-unit.source: Support for binding to data source controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.
trans-unit.target: 对绑定到数据源控件，如支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>。

trans-unit.source: Customizable appearance through user-defined templates and styles.
trans-unit.target: 通过用户定义的模板和样式的自定义外观。

trans-unit.source: Built-in sorting capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 内置的排序功能。

trans-unit.source: Built-in update and delete capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 内置更新和删除功能。

trans-unit.source: Built-in insert capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 内置插入功能。

trans-unit.source: Support for paging capabilities by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用分页功能的支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控件。

trans-unit.source: Built-in item selection capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 内置项选择功能。

trans-unit.source: Programmatic access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> object model to dynamically set properties, handle events, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 以编程方式访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>对象模型，以便动态设置属性、 处理事件，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: Multiple key fields.
trans-unit.target: 多个键字段。

trans-unit.source: To learn about other data-bound controls that are available in ASP.NET, see [Data-Bound Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9cf026e-d8b8-49f8-a3c4-64de2edbbb96).
trans-unit.target: 若要了解有关 ASP.NET 中提供其他数据绑定控件，请参阅[数据绑定 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9cf026e-d8b8-49f8-a3c4-64de2edbbb96)。

trans-unit.source: Templates
trans-unit.target: 模板

trans-unit.source: In order for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to display content, you must create templates for different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: 为了使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件显示内容，你必须创建该控件的不同部分的模板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> is required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>是必需的。

trans-unit.source: All other templates are optional.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他模板是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> property is not required.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>属性不是必需。

trans-unit.source: However, you must create a template for the mode in which the control is configured.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你必须创建用于在其中配置该控件的模式的模板。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control that supports inserting records must have an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template defined.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件必须支持将记录插入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>模板定义。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the templates that you can create for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可以为创建的模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Template type
trans-unit.target: 模板类型

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The root template that defines a container object, such as a `table`, `div`, or `span` element, that will contain the content defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: 定义容器对象，如根模板`table`， `div`，或`span`元素，将包含在中定义的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A>模板。

trans-unit.source: It might also contain a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> object.
trans-unit.target: 它可能还包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>对象。

trans-unit.source: Defines the data-bound content to display for individual items.
trans-unit.target: 定义要为各项显示的数据绑定内容。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content to render between individual items.
trans-unit.target: 定义要呈现各个项之间的内容。

trans-unit.source: Defines a container object, such as a table row (`tr`), `div`, or `span` element, that will contain the content defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EmptyItemTemplate%2A> templates.
trans-unit.target: 定义容器对象，例如表行 (`tr`)， `div`，或`span`元素，将包含在中定义的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EmptyItemTemplate%2A>模板。

trans-unit.source: The number of items that are displayed in a group is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupItemCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的组中显示的项的数目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupItemCount%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content to render between groups of items.
trans-unit.target: 定义要呈现的项的组之间的内容。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content to render for an empty item when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A> template is used.
trans-unit.target: 定义相应内容以便呈现为一个空项时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupTemplate%2A>使用模板。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupItemCount%2A> property is set to 5, and the total number of items returned from the data source is 8, the last group of data displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control will contain three items as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> template, and two items as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EmptyItemTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.GroupItemCount%2A>属性设置为 5，和从数据源返回的项的总数目为 8，显示的数据的最后一组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件将包含所指定的三个项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>模板和两个项所指定的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EmptyItemTemplate%2A>模板。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content to render if the data source returns no data.
trans-unit.target: 定义相应内容以便呈现如果数据源不返回任何数据。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content to render for the selected data item to differentiate the selected item from other items.
trans-unit.target: 定义相应内容以便呈现所选的数据项可将所选的项与其他项区分开来。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content to render for alternating items to make it easier to distinguish between consecutive items.
trans-unit.target: 定义要为交替项以使其更易于区分之间的连续项呈现的内容。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content to render when an item is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 定义要呈现时正在编辑某个项的内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template is rendered in place of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> template for the data item that is being edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>模板呈现代替了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>正在编辑的数据项模板。

trans-unit.source: Defines the content to render to insert an item.
trans-unit.target: 定义要呈现将项插入的内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template is rendered in place of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> template at either the start or at the end of the items that are displayed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>模板呈现代替了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>模板任一的开头或末尾的项显示的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can specify where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template is rendered by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemPosition%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>模板使用来呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemPosition%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: To display the value of a field in a template such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>, you use a data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: 若要在模板中显示的字段值如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>，使用数据绑定表达式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about data-binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a).
trans-unit.target: 有关数据绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。

trans-unit.source: To bind input controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> templates to fields of a data source, you can use two-way binding expressions.
trans-unit.target: 若要将绑定中的输入的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>模板到字段的数据源，您可以使用双向绑定表达式。

trans-unit.source: This enables the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to automatically extract the values of the input control for an update or insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 这使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件可以自动提取更新的输入控件的值或插入操作。

trans-unit.source: Two-way binding expressions also enable input controls in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> to automatically display the original field values.
trans-unit.target: 双向绑定表达式还可以使中的输入的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>自动显示字段的原始值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: 双向绑定表达式的详细信息，请参阅[绑定到数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。

trans-unit.source: Binding to a Data Source
trans-unit.target: 绑定到数据源

trans-unit.source: You can bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to a data source control (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control) or to any data source collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface, such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or other collection types.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>到数据源控件的控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件) 或任何数据源集合可实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口，如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或其他集合类型。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the following methods to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to the appropriate data source type:
trans-unit.target: 使用以下方法之一将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件添加到适当的数据源类型：

trans-unit.source: To bind to a data source control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 若要将绑定到数据源控件，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制转移到<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>数据源控件的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control automatically binds to the specified data source control and can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities to perform sorting, inserting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件自动绑定到指定的数据源控件，并且可以利用数据源控件的功能，以执行排序、 插入、 更新、 删除和分页功能。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred method to bind to data.
trans-unit.target: 这是将绑定到数据的首选的方法。

trans-unit.source: To bind to a data source that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface, programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to the data source, and then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定到数据源实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口，以编程方式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件拖到数据源，然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you use this technique, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control does not provide built-in sorting, updating, deleting, and paging functionality.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件不提供内置的排序、 更新、 删除和分页功能。

trans-unit.source: You must provide this functionality by using the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用相应的事件，你必须提供此功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about data binding, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).
trans-unit.target: 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 数据访问内容映射](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件可以用于显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before you display it in the application.
trans-unit.target: 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送显示应用程序中的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: We strongly recommend that values be HTML-encoded whenever possible before they are displayed in this control.
trans-unit.target: 我们强烈建议，值进行 HTML 编码尽可能之前它们将显示在此控件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to help block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供输入的请求验证功能，以便在用户输入的块脚本和 HTML。

trans-unit.source: You can also use validation server controls to check user input.
trans-unit.target: 验证服务器控件还可用于检查用户输入。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Introduction to the Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证控件简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3c0e7514-cff2-4bed-936d-ee3f7b740190)。

trans-unit.source: Data Operations
trans-unit.target: 数据操作

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is bound to a data source control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can take advantage of the data source control's capabilities and provide automatic sort, insert, update, and delete functionality.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件绑定到数据源控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件可以利用数据源控件的功能并提供自动排序、 插入、 更新和删除功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can provide support for sorting, inserting, updating, and deleting with other types of data sources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件可以提供对排序、 插入、 更新和删除与其他类型的数据源的支持。

trans-unit.source: However, in order to implement these operations, you must create code in an appropriate event handler.
trans-unit.target: 但是，为了实现这些操作，你必须创建在相应的事件处理程序代码。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control uses templates, it does not provide a way to automatically generate buttons to perform update, delete, insert, sort, or select operations.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件使用模板，它不提供自动生成按钮以执行更新、 删除、 插入、 排序，或选择操作的方法。

trans-unit.source: You must manually include these buttons in the appropriate template.
trans-unit.target: 在适当的模板，必须手动将这些按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control recognizes certain buttons whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property is set to a specific value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件可识别某些按钮，其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>属性设置为特定值。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the buttons that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control recognizes and their functions.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了这些按钮的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件可识别及其功能。

trans-unit.source: Button
trans-unit.target: Button

trans-unit.source: CommandName value
trans-unit.target: CommandName 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Cancel
trans-unit.target: 取消

trans-unit.source: "Cancel"
trans-unit.target: "取消"

trans-unit.source: Cancels an edit or insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消编辑或插入操作。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCanceling> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Delete
trans-unit.target: 删除

trans-unit.source: "Delete"
trans-unit.target: “Delete”

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 从数据源中删除当前记录。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>事件。

trans-unit.source: Select
trans-unit.target: 选择

trans-unit.source: "Select"
trans-unit.target: "选择"

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A> property value for the item.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndex%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDataItem.DisplayIndex%2A>项的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A> template for the item.
trans-unit.target: 呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>的项模板。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanging>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Edit
trans-unit.target: Edit

trans-unit.source: "Edit"
trans-unit.target: "编辑"

trans-unit.source: Puts the item in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 可使项进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template for the item.
trans-unit.target: 呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>的项模板。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemEditing> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Insert
trans-unit.target: Insert

trans-unit.source: "Insert"
trans-unit.target: "Insert"

trans-unit.source: Inserts the bound values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template into the data source.
trans-unit.target: 从的绑定的值插入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>入到数据源的模板。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted>事件。

trans-unit.source: Update
trans-unit.target: 更新

trans-unit.source: "Update"
trans-unit.target: "更新"

trans-unit.source: Updates the current record in the data source with the bound values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: 更新数据源中的当前记录中的绑定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>模板。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated> events.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdating>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemUpdated>事件。

trans-unit.source: Sort
trans-unit.target: 排序

trans-unit.source: "Sort"
trans-unit.target: "Sort"

trans-unit.source: Sorts the columns listed in the `CommandArgument` property of the button.
trans-unit.target: 中列出的列进行排序`CommandArgument`该按钮的属性。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted> events.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorting>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sorted>事件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the Delete button (which deletes the current data item immediately), when the Edit button is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control displays the current item in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 与删除按钮 （从而会立即删除当前数据项） 不同，单击编辑按钮时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件处于编辑模式显示当前项。

trans-unit.source: In edit mode, the content that is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A> property is displayed for the current data item.
trans-unit.target: 在编辑模式下中, 包含的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.EditItemTemplate%2A>属性显示为当前数据项。

trans-unit.source: Typically, in the edit item template, the Edit button is replaced with an Update and a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，在编辑项模板中，编辑按钮被替换为更新和取消按钮。

trans-unit.source: Input controls that are appropriate for the field's data type (such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control) also usually display a field's value for a user to modify.
trans-unit.target: 输入适合于该字段的数据类型的控件 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件) 通常还显示用户修改的字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Update button updates the record in the data source, and clicking the Cancel button cancels the edit operation.
trans-unit.target: 单击更新按钮更新数据源中的记录并单击取消按钮取消编辑操作。

trans-unit.source: The insert functionality is enabled when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemPosition%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.InsertItemPosition.FirstItem> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.InsertItemPosition.LastItem>.
trans-unit.target: 启用插入功能时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemPosition%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.InsertItemPosition.FirstItem>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.InsertItemPosition.LastItem>。

trans-unit.source: This property defines where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template is rendered for the insert item.
trans-unit.target: 此属性定义在何处<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>模板呈现为插入项。

trans-unit.source: The insert item template typically includes an Insert and a Cancel button, and empty input controls are displayed for users to enter the values for the new record.
trans-unit.target: 插入项模板通常包括插入和取消按钮，并为用户输入新的记录的值显示空的输入的控件。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Insert button inserts the record in the data source, and clicking the Cancel button clears all the fields.
trans-unit.target: 单击插入按钮在数据源中插入记录并单击取消按钮清除所有字段。

trans-unit.source: Sorting
trans-unit.target: 排序

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control enables users to sort the items by clicking the Sort button.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件使用户可以通过单击排序按钮的项进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Sort functionality is defined in the `CommandArgument` property of the button that contains the columns to be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 在中定义排序功能`CommandArgument`包含要排序的列的按钮属性。

trans-unit.source: Paging
trans-unit.target: 分页

trans-unit.source: Instead of displaying all the records from the data source at the same time, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control can break the records into pages.
trans-unit.target: 而不是在同一时间，显示来自数据源的所有记录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件可以分成若干记录页面。

trans-unit.source: To enable paging, associate a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用分页，将关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Then insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: 然后插入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控件内部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A>模板。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control is outside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager>控件超出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制、 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Events
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events that are supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了支持的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the Cancel button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Cancel") is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control cancels the insert or edit operation.
trans-unit.target: 发生时取消按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"取消") 单击后，之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件取消 insert 或编辑操作。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to stop the cancel operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于停止取消操作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> 控件中单击某个按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to perform a custom task when a button is clicked in the control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于在控件中单击一个按钮时执行自定义任务。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new item is created in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 中创建新项时出现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to modify the content of an item when the item is created.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于创建项时修改项的内容。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a data item is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 当数据项绑定到中的数据时发生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to modify the content of an item when the item is bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于修改项的内容项绑定到数据时。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 时发生的删除按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Delete") 单击或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>调用方法，之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件从数据源中删除记录。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于检查删除操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 时发生的删除按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Delete") 单击或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>调用方法，但之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件从数据源中删除记录。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to confirm or cancel the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于确认或取消删除操作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Edit button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Edit") is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 时发生的编辑按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Edit") 单击后，之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the editing operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于取消编辑操作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control inserts the new record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 时发生的插入按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Insert") 单击或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A>调用方法，之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件将数据源中插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于检查插入操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: 时发生的插入按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Insert") 单击或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertNewItem%2A>调用方法，但之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件插入记录。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the insert operation or change or validate the values of the new item.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于取消插入操作或更改或验证新项的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: 时发生的更新按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 单击或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A>调用方法，之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件更新记录。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to check the results of the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于检查更新操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: 时发生的更新按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 单击或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.UpdateItem%2A>调用方法，但之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件更新记录。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the updating operation or change or validate the values of the edited item.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于取消更新操作或更改或验证编辑的项的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> template is created in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.LayoutTemplate%2A> 控件中创建 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> 模板后发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to perform a task after the template is created.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于创建模板后执行的任务。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the page properties change, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control sets the new values.
trans-unit.target: 在页属性更改且 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> 控件设置新值之后发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the data-page properties change, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control sets the new values.
trans-unit.target: 之前的数据页属性更改时发生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件设置新值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: 选择按钮时发生 (一个具有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Select") 单击后，之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件处理选择操作。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to perform a custom task after an item is selected in the control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于在控件中选择项之后执行自定义任务。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: 选择按钮时发生 (一个具有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"Select") 单击后，之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件处理选择操作。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the select operation.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于取消选择操作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Sort button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Sort") is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called, after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 时发生一个排序按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"排序") 单击或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A>调用方法，之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件处理排序操作。

trans-unit.source: This event is typically used to perform a custom task after a user clicks a Sort button and the data has been sorted.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用于执行自定义任务之后用户单击排序按钮，并且数据已排序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Sort button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Sort") is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control handles the sort operation.
trans-unit.target: 时发生一个排序按钮 (带有按钮其`CommandName`属性设置为"排序") 单击或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Sort%2A>调用方法，但之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件处理排序操作。

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to cancel the sorting operation or to perform a custom sorting routine.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消排序操作或执行自定义排序例程，通常使用此事件。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 声明性语法

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to display records from a database by using an HTML table.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件来显示通过使用 HTML 表的数据库中的记录。

trans-unit.source: The values are retrieved by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用检索的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to display values in a flow layout by using the `div` element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件通过使用在数据流布局中显示值`div`元素。

trans-unit.source: The values are retrieved by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用检索的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to insert, delete, and update records.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件插入、 删除和更新记录。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>类。

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to a page, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> object.
trans-unit.target: 动态地添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制到页上，创建一个新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>对象。

trans-unit.source: Set its properties, and then add it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection of a container control, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder> control.
trans-unit.target: 设置其属性，并将其添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合的容器控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>控件。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AccessKey" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is not supported by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控件不支持设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that the property is not set.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示该属性未设置。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are not supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 不支持样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: If you try to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AccessKey%2A> property, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AccessKey%2A>属性，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If you get the property, it returns the default value of the corresponding property of the base class.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the controls to be added to the container.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，包含要添加到容器的控件。

trans-unit.source: The container that is used to store the child controls.
trans-unit.target: 用于存储子控件的容器。

trans-unit.source: The location in the controls collection at which to add the child control.
trans-unit.target: 控件集合中要添加子控件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified control to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 将指定控件添加到指定容器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AddControlToContainer%2A> method is a helper method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control to add a control to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AddControlToContainer%2A>方法是由调用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件将控件添加到指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the alternating data item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控件中交替数据项的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the custom content for the alternating data item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控件中交替数据项的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> property to define a custom user interface (UI) for the alternating data item.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>属性来定义交替数据项自定义用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> template usually contains the same controls and content as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> template, but with a different appearance to distinguish items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>模板通常包含相同的控件和作为内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>模板，但具有不同的外观来区分项。

trans-unit.source: To specify the custom template declaratively, add an `AlternatingItemTemplate` element inside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以声明方式指定的自定义模板，将添加`AlternatingItemTemplate`内的元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Then add controls and content between the opening and closing `<AlternatingItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然后，添加控件和内容之间的开始和结束`<AlternatingItemTemplate>`标记。

trans-unit.source: To display the field values from the data source, use a data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示的数据源中的字段值，请使用数据绑定表达式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定表达式概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。

trans-unit.source: To create buttons that automatically select, delete, and edit operations, add a button control to the template.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建自动选择、 删除和编辑操作的按钮，请向模板添加一个按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: Set its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property to one of the values listed in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data field whose value is used to uniquely identify each data row of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control when the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据字段的名称，当 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode" /> 时，这些数据字段的值用于唯一地标识 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable" /> 控件的每个数据行。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data field whose value is used to uniquely identify each instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control when ASP.NET generates the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 数据字段的名称，当 ASP.NET 生成 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 值时，这些数据字段的值用于唯一地标识 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 控件的每个实例。

trans-unit.source: To prevent naming conflicts when multiple instances of a control are rendered in multiple rows of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control, ASP.NET generates a unique <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value for each instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止命名冲突的多行中呈现的控件的多个实例时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件，ASP.NET 生成唯一<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>控件的每个实例的值。

trans-unit.source: You specify how the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value is generated by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你指定如何<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>通过设置生成值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>, ASP.NET generates the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> by appending a suffix that is derived from the data field specified in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>，ASP.NET 生成<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>由派生自数据字段中指定的后缀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A> is not set, the suffix is a sequential number.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.ClientIDRowSuffix%2A>未设置，后缀是序列号。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 获取数据值，在 ASP.NET 生成 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 值时，这些数据值用于唯一标识数据绑定控件的每个实例。

trans-unit.source: The data values that are used to uniquely identify each instance of a data-bound control when ASP.NET generates the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 数据值，在 ASP.NET 生成 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID" /> 值时，这些数据值用于唯一标识数据绑定控件的每个实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> object that represents the child controls of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> 对象，该对象表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控件的子控件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child controls for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控件的子控件集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Controls%2A> property overrides the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Controls%2A>属性重写基实现。

trans-unit.source: This guarantees that all child controls have been created before the property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 这可保证属性返回之前是否已创建所有子控件<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> property enables you to programmatically access the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> class for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>属性使您能够以编程方式访问的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can add controls to the collection, remove controls from the collection, or iterate through the server controls in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将控件添加到集合、 从集合中，删除控件或循环访问集合中的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: To access a specific child control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问特定的子控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to null values when the data field is updated in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在数据源中更新数据字段时是否将空字符串值 ("") 自动转换为 null 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if empty string values are automatically converted to null values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果将空字符串值自动转换为 null 值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object of the data source control that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is bound to also has a property named <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>的数据源对象控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件绑定到也有一个名为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This property performs the same function.
trans-unit.target: 此属性执行相同的功能。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that both properties are set appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 请确保这两个属性正确设置。

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy that is used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于呈现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控件的控件层次结构。

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy that is used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control, based on the values that are stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 根据视图状态中存储的值，创建用于呈现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控件的控件层次结构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.CreateChildControls> method is a helper method that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> class to create the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.CreateChildControls>方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>类，以创建控制层次结构。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the method creates the control hierarchy based on values from view state, instead of directly from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 此重载的方法创建控件层次结构而不是直接从数据源基于从视图状态的值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the data source for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控件的数据源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the child controls are bound to data; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the control will re-create itself from view state during a postback.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则表示将子控件绑定到数据；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则表示控件将在回发期间从视图状态重新创建自身。

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy that is used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> control by using the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定数据源创建用于呈现 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView" /> 控件的控件层次结构。

trans-unit.source: The number of items that are created.
trans-unit.target: 所创建的项数。

trans-unit.target: 将为后缀提供值的数据源。

trans-unit.target: 后缀数组。
